entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
